</usVsContinent> <featuredStories> <story rank="1" active="true"> <title>Oceania: Island Giants in a Boundless Blue</title> <text>From Australia’s red heart to Papua’s cloud-piercing peaks, Oceania is a continent of island mountains adrift in an ocean twice the size of the Atlantic.</text> <images> <image slot="1"> <caption>Carstensz Pyramid’s equatorial ice cap</caption> <stockSearch
